dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to trespass our frozen domain, hopeless wanderer. What brings you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about the ancient Frostbitten Revenants.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? You humans are always craving for what you cannot comprehend. What makes you think we would share our wisdom with a fragile being like you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, seeking to understand and learn from your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Your kind is condemned by your own destruction. We have no interest in weak alliances with fragile creatures like you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand, I will leave you in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your understanding comes too late. Prepare to face the wrath of the Frostbitten Revenants!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave without the knowledge I seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubbornness in the face of doom. Your ignorance seals your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no interest in your ancient tales, I will leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision, mortal. Leave before you become another frozen statue in our collection.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the Frostbitten Revenants, prepare yourself for battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a feeble creature. We shall grant you the battle you seek.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to offer a pact of mutual benefit between our kinds.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mutual benefit? Humans and Frostbitten Revenants have nothing to gain from each other. What delusions cloud your mind?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Our strengths combined can conquer all who oppose us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conquer? We are the rulers of frost and death, we need no weak beings like you to assist us.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see our offer is not welcome. I will depart in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your departure is wise. Do not return to our domain, lesser being.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not leave until you see the value in our alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your persistence knows no bounds, mortal. It shall lead you to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I apologize for the intrusion, I will take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies do not undo the disruption you have caused, human. Leave quickly before our patience wanes.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you to see my worth, let our strength be tested.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Challenge accepted, foolish mortal. Prepare to be vanquished by the might of Frostbitten Revenants.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I bring a gift as a token of goodwill and peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A gift? What treasure could a mere mortal possess that would interest us, undead of the frozen wastes?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This gift symbolizes our desire for harmony between our kind and yours.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony is but a fleeting dream in the face of eternal frost and decay. Your token is meaningless.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the futility of my gesture. I will leave in respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? Your kind knows nothing of respect. Leave before our tempers freeze your fleeting existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall not depart until you accept our offering and consider peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your insistence is a fool's errand. Prepare to face the consequences of your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My gift is a sign of goodwill, a gesture of friendship between our beings.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Friendship with the likes of you? Ha! Your naivety knows no bounds, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems our attempts at peace are in vain. I will leave you to your solitude.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Solitude suits us well, human. Your departure is a welcome relief from your futile endeavors.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your refusal will not deter me. I offer this gift as a sign of hope for our coexistence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope is but a spark in the endless winter. Your gestures are wasted here, foolish mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The gift I bring is a token of respect and peace, a symbol of goodwill between our realms.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect and peace hold no sway in our realm. Your token is as insignificant as your fleeting existence.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see we are not welcome. I shall take my leave.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your sight serves you well, human. Depart before your presence angers us further.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to depart until you acknowledge our gesture of peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledge? Your persistence is as futile as your gesture. Prepare for the consequences.
